 31namespace impl
 32{
 33template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
 34          typename                  T,
 35	  typename                  Block,
 36	  typename                  OrderT,
 37	  int                       Dim>
 38struct Par_reduction_eval_base
 39{
 40  static bool const ct_valid = 
 41    !impl::Is_local_map<typename Block::map_type>::value &&
 42    impl::Reduction_supported<ReduceT<typename Block::value_type>::rtype,
 43			      typename Block::value_type>::value;
 44
 45  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)
 46  { return true; }
 47};
 48
 49} // namespace vsip::impl
 50} // namespace vsip

 53namespace vsip_csl

 58template<template <typename> class ReduceT>
 59struct List<op::reduce<ReduceT> >
 60{
 61  typedef Make_type_list<be::cbe_sdk,
 62			 be::cvsip,
 63			 be::mercury_sal,
 64			 be::generic>::type type;
 65};
 66
 67/// Generic evaluator for vector reductions.
 68template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
 69	  typename                  T,
 70	  typename                  Block>
 71struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic, 
 72                 void(T&, Block const&, row1_type, impl::Int_type<1>)>
 73{
 74  static bool const ct_valid = true;
 75  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, row1_type, impl::Int_type<1>)
 76  { return true; }
 77
 78  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, row1_type, impl::Int_type<1>)
 79  {
 80    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
 81    typename ReduceT<VT>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
 82
 83    length_type length = a.size(1, 0);
 84    PRAGMA_IVDEP
 85    for (index_type i=0; i<length; ++i)
 86    {
 87      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i));
 88      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
 89    }
 90
 91    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length);
 92  }
 93};
 94
 95
 96/// Generic evaluator for matrix reductions (tuple<0, 1, 2>).
 97template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
 98	  typename                  T,
 99	  typename                  Block>
100struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
101                 void(T&, Block const&, row2_type, impl::Int_type<2>)>
102{
103  static bool const ct_valid = true;
104  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, row2_type, impl::Int_type<2>)
105  { return true; }
106
107  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, row2_type, impl::Int_type<2>)
108  {
109    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
110    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
111
112    length_type length_i = a.size(2, 0);
113    length_type length_j = a.size(2, 1);
114
115    for (index_type i=0; i<length_i; ++i)
116      PRAGMA_IVDEP
117      for (index_type j=0; j<length_j; ++j)
118      {
119	state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j));
120	if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
121      }
122
123    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_i*length_j);
124  }
125};
126
127
128/// Generic evaluator for matrix reductions (tuple<2, 1, 0>).
129template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
130	  typename                  T,
131	  typename                  Block>
132struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
133                 void(T&, Block const&, col2_type, impl::Int_type<2>)>
134{
135  static bool const ct_valid = true;
136  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, col2_type, impl::Int_type<2>)
137  { return true; }
138
139  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, col2_type, impl::Int_type<2>)
140  {
141    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
142    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
143
144    length_type length_i = a.size(2, 0);
145    length_type length_j = a.size(2, 1);
146
147    for (index_type j=0; j<length_j; ++j)
148    PRAGMA_IVDEP
149    for (index_type i=0; i<length_i; ++i)
150    {
151      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j));
152      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
153    }
154
155    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_i*length_j);
156  }
157};

160/// Generic evaluator for tensor reductions (tuple<0, 1, 2>).
161template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
162	  typename                  T,
163	  typename                  Block>
164struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
165                 void(T&, Block const&, tuple<0, 1, 2>, impl::Int_type<3>)>
166{
167  static bool const ct_valid = true;
168  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, tuple<0, 1, 2>, impl::Int_type<3>)
169  { return true; }
170
171  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, tuple<0, 1, 2>, impl::Int_type<3>)
172  {
173    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
174    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
175
176    length_type length_0 = a.size(3, 0);
177    length_type length_1 = a.size(3, 1);
178    length_type length_2 = a.size(3, 2);
179
180    for (index_type i=0; i<length_0; ++i)
181    for (index_type j=0; j<length_1; ++j)
182    for (index_type k=0; k<length_2; ++k)
183    {
184      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j, k));
185      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
186    }
187
188    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_0*length_1*length_2);
189  }
190};
191
192
193/// Generic evaluator for tensor reductions (tuple<0, 2, 1>).
194template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
195	  typename                  T,
196	  typename                  Block>
197struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
198                 void(T&, Block const&, tuple<0, 2, 1>, impl::Int_type<3>)>
199{
200  static bool const ct_valid = true;
201  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, tuple<0, 2, 1>, impl::Int_type<3>)
202  { return true; }
203
204  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, tuple<0, 2, 1>, impl::Int_type<3>)
205  {
206    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
207    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
208
209    length_type length_0 = a.size(3, 0);
210    length_type length_1 = a.size(3, 1);
211    length_type length_2 = a.size(3, 2);
212
213    for (index_type i=0; i<length_0; ++i)
214    for (index_type k=0; k<length_2; ++k)
215    for (index_type j=0; j<length_1; ++j)
216    {
217      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j, k));
218      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
219    }
220
221    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_0*length_1*length_2);
222  }
223};

226/// Generic evaluator for tensor reductions (tuple<1, 0, 2>).
227template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
228	  typename                  T,
229	  typename                  Block>
230struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
231                 void(T&, Block const&, tuple<1, 0, 2>, impl::Int_type<3>)>
232{
233  static bool const ct_valid = true;
234  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, tuple<1, 0, 2>, impl::Int_type<3>)
235  { return true; }
236
237  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, tuple<1, 0, 2>, impl::Int_type<3>)
238  {
239    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
240    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
241
242    length_type length_0 = a.size(3, 0);
243    length_type length_1 = a.size(3, 1);
244    length_type length_2 = a.size(3, 2);
245
246    for (index_type j=0; j<length_1; ++j)
247    for (index_type i=0; i<length_0; ++i)
248    for (index_type k=0; k<length_2; ++k)
249    {
250      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j, k));
251      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
252    }
253
254    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_0*length_1*length_2);
255  }
256};

259/// Generic evaluator for tensor reductions (tuple<1, 2, 0>).
260template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
261	  typename                  T,
262	  typename                  Block>
263struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
264                 void(T&, Block const&, tuple<1, 2, 0>, impl::Int_type<3>)>
265{
266  static bool const ct_valid = true;
267  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, tuple<1, 2, 0>, impl::Int_type<3>)
268  { return true; }
269
270  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, tuple<1, 2, 0>, impl::Int_type<3>)
271  {
272    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
273    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
274
275    length_type length_0 = a.size(3, 0);
276    length_type length_1 = a.size(3, 1);
277    length_type length_2 = a.size(3, 2);
278
279    for (index_type j=0; j<length_1; ++j)
280    for (index_type k=0; k<length_2; ++k)
281    for (index_type i=0; i<length_0; ++i)
282    {
283      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j, k));
284      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
285    }
286
287    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_0*length_1*length_2);
288  }
289};

292/// Generic evaluator for tensor reductions (tuple<2, 0, 1>).
293template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
294	  typename                  T,
295	  typename                  Block>
296struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
297                 void(T&, Block const&, tuple<2, 0, 1>, impl::Int_type<3>)>
298{
299  static bool const ct_valid = true;
300  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, tuple<2, 0, 1>, impl::Int_type<3>)
301  { return true; }
302
303  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, tuple<2, 0, 1>, impl::Int_type<3>)
304  {
305    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
306    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
307
308    length_type length_0 = a.size(3, 0);
309    length_type length_1 = a.size(3, 1);
310    length_type length_2 = a.size(3, 2);
311
312    for (index_type k=0; k<length_2; ++k)
313    for (index_type i=0; i<length_0; ++i)
314    for (index_type j=0; j<length_1; ++j)
315    {
316      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j, k));
317      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
318    }
319
320    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_0*length_1*length_2);
321  }
322};

325/// Generic evaluator for tensor reductions (tuple<2, 1, 0>).
326template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
327	  typename                  T,
328	  typename                  Block>
329struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::generic,
330                 void(T&, Block const&, tuple<2, 1, 0>, impl::Int_type<3>)>
331{
332  static bool const ct_valid = true;
333  static bool rt_valid(T&, Block const&, tuple<2, 1, 0>, impl::Int_type<3>)
334  { return true; }
335
336  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, tuple<2, 1, 0>, impl::Int_type<3>)
337  {
338    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
339    typename ReduceT<T>::accum_type state = ReduceT<VT>::initial();
340
341    length_type length_0 = a.size(3, 0);
342    length_type length_1 = a.size(3, 1);
343    length_type length_2 = a.size(3, 2);
344
345    for (index_type k=0; k<length_2; ++k)
346    for (index_type j=0; j<length_1; ++j)
347    for (index_type i=0; i<length_0; ++i)
348    {
349      state = ReduceT<VT>::update(state, a.get(i, j, k));
350      if (ReduceT<VT>::done(state)) break;
351    }
352
353    r = ReduceT<VT>::value(state, length_0*length_1*length_2);
354  }
355};
356
357template <typename                  T,
358	  typename                  Block,
359	  typename                  OrderT,
360	  int                       Dim>
361struct Evaluator<op::reduce<impl::Mean_value>, be::parallel,
362                 void(T&, Block const&, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)>
363  : vsip::impl::Par_reduction_eval_base<impl::Mean_value, T, Block, OrderT, Dim>
364{
365  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)
366  {
367    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
368    T l_r;
369    typedef typename impl::Distributed_local_block<Block>::type local_block_type;
370    typedef typename impl::Block_layout<local_block_type>::order_type order_type;
371    typedef impl::Int_type<Dim>                                       dim_type;
372    typedef impl::Mean_value<VT>                                      reduce_type;
373    typedef typename Block::map_type                            map_type;
374
375    dispatch<op::reduce<impl::Sum_value>, void,
376             typename impl::Sum_value<VT>::result_type&,
377             local_block_type const&,
378             order_type,
379             dim_type>
380      (l_r, get_local_block(a), order_type(), dim_type());
381
382    if (!impl::Type_equal<map_type, Global_map<Block::dim> >::value)
383	r = a.map().impl_comm().allreduce(reduce_type::rtype, l_r);
384    else
385      r = l_r;
386
387    r /= static_cast<typename reduce_type::accum_type>(a.size());
388  }
389};
390
391
392
393template <typename                  T,
394	  typename                  Block,
395	  typename                  OrderT,
396	  int                       Dim>
397struct Evaluator<op::reduce<impl::Mean_magsq_value>, be::parallel,
398                 void(T&, Block const&, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)>
399  : vsip::impl::Par_reduction_eval_base<impl::Mean_magsq_value, T, Block, OrderT, Dim>
400{
401  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)
402  {
403    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
404    T l_r;
405    typedef typename impl::Distributed_local_block<Block>::type local_block_type;
406    typedef typename impl::Block_layout<local_block_type>::order_type order_type;
407    typedef impl::Int_type<Dim>                                       dim_type;
408    typedef impl::Mean_magsq_value<VT>                                reduce_type;
409    typedef typename Block::map_type                            map_type;
410
411    dispatch<op::reduce<impl::Sum_magsq_value>, void,
412      typename impl::Sum_magsq_value<VT>::result_type&,
413             local_block_type const&,
414             order_type,
415             dim_type>
416      (l_r, get_local_block(a), order_type(), dim_type());
417
418    if (!impl::Type_equal<map_type, Global_map<Block::dim> >::value)
419      r = a.map().impl_comm().allreduce(reduce_type::rtype, l_r);
420    else
421      r = l_r;
422
423    r /= static_cast<typename reduce_type::accum_type>(a.size());
424  }
425};
426
427
428template <template <typename> class ReduceT,
429	  typename                  T,
430	  typename                  Block,
431	  typename                  OrderT,
432	  int                       Dim>
433struct Evaluator<op::reduce<ReduceT>, be::parallel, 
434                 void(T&, Block const&, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)>
435  : vsip::impl::Par_reduction_eval_base<ReduceT, T, Block, OrderT, Dim>
436{
437  static void exec(T& r, Block const& a, OrderT, impl::Int_type<Dim>)
438  {
439    typedef typename Block::value_type VT;
440    T l_r = T();
441    typedef typename impl::Distributed_local_block<Block>::type local_block_type;
442    typedef typename impl::Block_layout<local_block_type>::order_type order_type;
443    typedef impl::Int_type<Dim>                                       dim_type;
444    typedef ReduceT<VT>                                         reduce_type;
445    typedef typename Block::map_type                            map_type;
446
447    dispatch<op::reduce<ReduceT>, void,
448             typename ReduceT<VT>::result_type&,
449	     local_block_type const&,
450             order_type,
451             dim_type>
452      (l_r, get_local_block(a), order_type(), dim_type());
453
454    if (!impl::Type_equal<map_type, Global_map<Block::dim> >::value)
455      r = a.map().impl_comm().allreduce(ReduceT<T>::rtype, l_r);
456    else
457      r = l_r;
458  }
459};
